subskills.DESCRIPTION: Sort objects by their ability to float or sink in water, predicting and testing their motion
Demonstrate how magnets can move objects without touching them through magnetic force
Create a simple ramp system to show how incline affects object speed and distance
Identify and sort objects that bounce versus those that don't, explaining observed differences
Use wind (breath or fan) to move lightweight objects, controlling direction and distance
Balance objects of different weights on a simple seesaw to explore equilibrium
Demonstrate how objects in water can be moved by creating waves and currents
Sort materials by their ability to stretch and return to original shape
Create and test paper airplane designs to explore air resistance and flight
Compare how different balls roll on various surfaces (carpet, wood, grass)
Design and build a simple pendulum to observe repeated motion patterns
